模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.removable.projectile

类 HeroProjectile

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.GameObject
com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.MovableObject
com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.removable.projectile.Projectile
com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.removable.projectile.HeroProjectile
public class HeroProjectile extends Projectile
The HeroProjectile class handles the specificities with the projectile being shot from a hero. For ae2dms, the hero's projectile has a different color than the projectile of an enemy. It also can hurt an enemy and a boss. Hero can stand on the project and float with the projectile. If the projectiles from hero and boss overlap, then both disappear.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • HeroProjectile

      public HeroProjectile​(InteractableWorld world, int x, int y, int direction)
      Initialize the projectile of hero.
      参数:
      world - InteractableWorld type, the instance of InteractableWorld.
      x - int type, the initial horizontal position of the projectile of hero.
      y - int type, the initial vertical position of the projectile of hero.
      direction - int type, the direction of the hero and the direction of the projectile.

      public void drawOn​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphicsContext)
      Draw the projectile of hero on the canvas.
      指定者:

      参数:
      graphicsContext - GraphicsContext type, draw calls to a Canvas using a buffer.

      参数:

    • collideWith

      public void collideWith​(FloorUnit floorUnit)

      参数:
      floorUnit -

    • collideWith

      public void collideWith​(Monster monster)
      Projectile of hero collides with monster.
      参数:

    • collideWith

      public void collideWith​(Boss boss)
      Projectile of hero collides with boss.
      参数:
      boss - Boss type, the special enemy.

    • collideWith

      public void collideWith​(EnemyProjectile enemyProjectile)
      Projectile of hero collides with the projectile of boss and then both disappear.
      参数:
      enemyProjectile - EnemyProjectile type, the projectile of the boss.
